reviewText: Horrible video. Casts some pretty young thing pretending to be his wife to lure viewers, and just skips around the country showing off. Not an ounce of information you couldn't glean off from a forum or youtube video. (Some of which, are of much higher production value and done by teenagers.) Don't waste your money on this dud.

Video has very little information on fishing tailwaters. Does not show any techniques on fly fishing tailwaters. Just shows authors fishing around the country with zero information. Most of the video is just advertising all the authors other videos. Would not waste money to purchase this video.
Contents are geared for where to fish around the USA rather than demonstrating techniques used in tailwaters. One of the co-authors does little to add to the information contained therein.
